reviewText: Great movie, the more I watch Bollywood movies the more I love India!
I expected to receive the Philip Glass opera and not this film with the same name having nothing to do with the significant message of the applauded opera.
Like the best of Frank Capra, this is a film that will make you want to take to the street in support of human rights.  Excellent performances by all involved.
When you have an interest on the role of each Citizen to help Democracy  become a better form of government, specially in modern emerging countries, this film offers valuable lessons.
